revised_title: Description and Analysis of a New Species of Manis or Scaly Lizard
tldr: The author describes a new species of Manis or scaly lizard, called Alungu, found in the East Indies. This rare and remarkable animal has a unique appearance and is able to kill an elephant by twisting its trunk. The Alungu belongs to the family of ant-eaters, which have no teeth and catch ants with their long, round tongues.
